data.actual_result: The setting is partially applied: some of the embeds show, others don't. Restarting the app fixes it.
data.expected_result: No idea if this setting is supposed to apply retroactively, but all embeds should follow the same rule: either they all show, either none of them show
data.short_description: The toggle for embed links does not apply correctly until Discord is restarted
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel full of messages with rich embeds. For example a bot's log - Toggle the "Show website preview info from links pasted into chat." switch in Settings > Text & images - Switch to a different channel and switch back to the one you found at step 1 - Scroll through chat and observe
